Compares two {{tt|stop_source}} values.

{{cpp/hidden friend|std::stop_source}}

{{cpp/note synthesized eq}}

===Parameters===
{{par begin}}
{{par|lhs, rhs|{{tt|stop_source}}s to compare}}

===Return value===
